TopicTitle: MK2 inline cockpit overheats the first

Articles.Content:
Version 1.0 the MK2 cockpit always blows up faster than any other parts.

Version 1.02 the Mk2 cockpit hardly blows up anymore but the Mk2 Inline cockpit always blows up faster than any other parts.

I noticed this last night, I plan to replace the cockpit with a drone core and a crew module, but this should be fixed. The second that my re-entering plane pitched one degree above the flow of the airstream that cockpit started overheating while the mk2 parts around it were fine.
